description:
Backlog Expedition is a meta game where a viking sets out on an expedition to an archipelago.
In order to slay monsters and open chests to grab their loot,
the player has to complete objectives in their backlog of games/movies/series etc.

v1.0.0.description:
## The first release includes
- Up to 400 custom location possible
- 3 types of custom locations. (Backlog, Limited and Repeatable) 
- Backlog games will each create their own island, while the Limited and Repeatable locations will appear randomly on each island.
- Option to pick how many treasures are required to goal.
- Option to pick how many locations each island will have. (If a Backlog game is bigger, it will go over though)

## Learn more about this AP-world
- [Setup guide](https://github.com/Nikkilites/Archipelago-BacklogExpedition-APWorld/blob/main/docs/setup_en.md)
- [Info](https://github.com/Nikkilites/Archipelago-BacklogExpedition-APWorld/blob/main/docs/en_Backlog%20Expedition.md)
v1.0.0.title: First Release of Backlog Expedition APWorld

v1.1.0.description:
## This version adds
Option to add prioritized locations 
- Will be prioritized over other locations except backlog locations
- Can be used for a full shuffle mode, if backlog locations are left out of the YAML

Option to pick amount of Islands
- This allows for shuffled Islands that do not depend on a backlog game
- Shuffled islands will fill up to the amount of Locations per Island defined in the YAML
- Getting the Treasure of a shuffled Island requires checking all locations within that island

## Notes about this version
Compatible with v.1.0.0 of the game

Known bugs:
- If there are no repeatable locations and your world includes shuffled islands, the generation will fail if not enough other locations are present
- If your number of islands equal the number of treasures required to goal, the generation will fail.

## Learn more about this AP-world
- [Setup guide](https://github.com/Nikkilites/Archipelago-BacklogExpedition-APWorld/blob/main/docs/setup_en.md)
- [Info](https://github.com/Nikkilites/Archipelago-BacklogExpedition-APWorld/blob/main/docs/en_Backlog%20Expedition.md)
v1.1.0.title: Backlog Expedition APWorld Feature Update

v1.1.1.description:

v1.1.2.description:
## Hotfix
- Fixed a bug where every player of BEx would have a shared hint_data variable
- Fixed a bug where the generation would crash if a player had more locations in a backlog game than stated in Locations per Island

## Notes about this version
Compatible with v.1.0.0 of the game

## Learn more about this AP-world

v1.1.2.title: Backlog Expedition APWorld Hotfix 2
